message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which we believe has immense value and potential for growth. After careful consideration and assessment of its unique features and benefits, we propose an initial offer of $1500000 for the product. This price reflects not only its current value but also its future potential, considering the market trends and the impact it could have on your business. We are confident that this investment will yield significant returns for you. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe the product has great potential, but I need to ensure it fits within my budget. I'd love to discuss this further and see if we can meet in the middle.
